short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension, will parse stream of data which is in tag length value format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This parses a stream of alphanumeric data which is in Tag Length Value format. 
Eg. input string = 0107sateesh0205bandi, when the text is in this format, you can select such text on any chrome webpage, and then right click and select TLV Parser
shall popup a new window with the parsed data which is in a readable format.
or you can paste the buffer in the popup page when you clock the icon on the toolbar.
